metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6314 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
The make_available_at_least function in io-tiff.c in gdk-pixbuf allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via a large TIFF file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6314` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-gdkpixbuf-2.0 - 2.36.11-2
libgdk-pixbuf2.0-0 - 2.36.11-2
libgdk-pixbuf2.0-bin - 2.36.11-2
libgdk-pixbuf2.0-common - 2.36.11-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gdk-pixbuf package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.36.11-2').
